function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in office buildings due to close proximity of occupants.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreaks, leading to loss of productivity, operational disruptions, and potential harm to occupants.","Mitigation":"Implementing measures to control indoor air quality, ventilation, and sanitation to reduce the likelihood of disease transmission.","Technologies":"Air filtration and purification systems, smart ventilation control, UV-C disinfection, touchless fixtures, and antimicrobial surfaces.","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and staff members in commercial office buildings.","Owner":"Building operators, facility managers, and building owners."}]}
